description:
Chibi Panda`s father is determined to take him back to Dragon World. As the Mikado family tries to convince Papa Panda to let his son stay, Gao and Batzz must decide what is truly best for their friend.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Invasion of Papa Panda! Farewell, Chibi Panda!
Papa Panda Raishuu! Saraba, Chibi Panda!!
パパパンダ来襲! さらば, ちびパンダ!!
